text: وَنُرِيدُ أَن نَّمُنَّ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَنَجۡعَلَهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ وَنَجۡعَلَهُمُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ
translation: But We wanted to bestow favor upon those who were oppressed in the land[4], and make them leaders and inheritors [of the land],
footnotes: [4] i.e., the Children of Israel who were oppressed by Pharaoh in Egypt.
